Boosting referrals by making own account: Boosting ved å selv opprette nye kontoer vil føre til permanent utestenging.
You need to refer :needed more users, be: Du må verve :needed flere brukere, før du kan utløse belønningen din

Here at :hotel Hotel we are accepting do: Here at :hotel Hotel we are accepting donations to keep the hotel up & running and as a thank you, you will in return receive in-game goods.
Donations are important, as it will help: Donations are important, as it will help to pay our monthly bills needed to keep the hotel up & running, as well as adding new and exciting features for you and others to enjoy!
To purchase items from the :hotel shop,: To purchase items from the :hotel shop, please visit our Discord and contact the owner of :hotel Hotel to make your purchase
Make sure to use an email that you remem: Sørg for å bruke en ekte e-post, da du trenger den hvis du noen gang skulle glemme passordet ditt.

Dont have an account? Join now!: Har du ikke en bruker? Bli med nå!
Your username is what you will have to u: Brukernavnet ditt brukes for å logge inn på :hotel. Det er også hva andre brukere vil se, så sørg for å velge et navn du liker!
You will need your email if you were to: Du trenger e-postadressen din i telfelle du glemmer passordet ditt, så sørg for at det er noe du husker.
Your password must contain atleast 8 cha: Passordet må inneholde minst 8 tegn. Sørg for å bruke et unikt og sikkert passord.

Rules and regulations are subject to cha: Regler og forskrifter kan endres når som helst uten varsel. Som bruker av :hotel godtar du følgende vilkår og betingelser nedenfor. Ved brudd på disse reglene og forskriftene vil det resultere i straff. Dette kan være mute, midlertidig, eller permanent utestenging ut ifra alvorlighetsgrad. Hvis du har noen spørsmål eller bekymringer om reglene, ikke nøl med å kontakte :hotel Staff.
Do not abuse the Call for Help (CFH) sys: Ikke misbruk Call for help (CFH) systemet; den skal kun brukes om det er nødvendig.
Do not advertise other Habbo Retros; hot: Ikke annonser andre Habbo Retros; det er ikke tillatt å bruke hotelllenker eller å med vilje nevne et annet hotells navn er ikke tillatt.
Do not attempt to or scam credits or fur: Ikke forsøk å lure mynter eller møbler fra andre brukere gjennom spill, gambling eller handel.
Do not bully, harass, or abuse other use: Ikke mobb, trakassere eller misbruk andre brukere; unngå voldelig eller aggressiv oppførsel.
Do not disclose any personal information: Ikke oppgi noen personlig informasjon om en annen bruker (f.eks. adresse, IP-adresse, telefonnummer, skole, private bilder osv.) uten deres samtykke.
Do not excessively repeat identical or s: Ikke spam - det er absolutt ingen som synes det er morsomt.
Users are to not participate in any sexu: Brukere skal ikke delta i seksuelle, upassende eller generelt objektive handlinger overfor andre brukere uten deres samtykke.
Do not make rooms with inappropriate or: Ikke lag rom med upassende eller støtende navn.
Do not attempt to or successfully harm a: All form for hacking og digital sabotasje, både mot hotellet og andre brukere er strengt forbudt.
Do not disrupt events with explicit lang: Ikke forstyrr eventer med eksplisitt språk eller negativ oppførsel.
Do not attempt to or give away, buy, sel: Det er ikke lov å gi bort, kjøpe eller bytte :hotel
items for virtual items from another gam: items for virtual items from another game, accounts from another game, cash, or vice versa without permission from an Administrator. This includes giving away, buying, selling or trading
furniture/currency for Habbo furniture/c: furniture/currency for Habbo furniture/currency or vice versa.
Do not create a username with an offensi: Ikke opprett et brukernavn som er fornærmende, rasistisk, trakasserende eller generelt sett kritikkverdig.
Ikke bruk VPN for å omgå IP utestengelse.
Do not share your account with other use: Ikke del kontoen din med andre brukere.
Do not threaten to, attempt to, or hack: Det er ikke lov å true med, forsøk på eller hacke andre brukerkontoer.
Do not create multiple accounts for the: Ikke opprett flere kontoer med formål å utnytte verdisystemet på noen måte.
Do not re-appeal your ban unless stated: Ikke spør om å bli unbannet igjen med mindre vi sier noe annet ved første forsøk. Hvis du blir informert om at du kan søke på nytt etter 2-3 uker og du søker etter 2 dager, vil du bli permanent utestengt uten mulighet for unban fra både Discord og hotellet.
Accounts are limited to 2 per person. Th: Antall kontoer er begrenset til 2 per person. Dette betyr at kun 1 ALT-brukere er akseptabelt. Alt annet enn dette vil føre til at hele brukeren blir slettet, inkludert kreditter og rariteter.
Do not attempt to or exploit errors of: Ikke forsøk å eller utnytte feil og bugs på :hotel;
report it to the Administration immediat: rapporter det til en staff medlem umiddelbart.
Do not attempt to or refund your VIP Mem: Ikke prøv å refundere ditt VIP-medlemskap eller donasjon til :hotel
at any given time; all payments are fina: til enhver tid; alle kjøp er endelige.
Do not intentionally give wrong or misle: Ikke gi med vilje feil eller villedende informasjon til Staff i forbindelse med rapporter om regelbrudd, klager, bug rapporter eller hjelpeforespørsler.
Do not pretend to be a representative of: Ikke lat som om du representerer :hotel.
This includes mimicing, acting like them: Dette inkluderer å late som eller å påstå at du er med i Staff.
Do not threaten to, attempt to, or use a: Det er ikke lov å true med, forsøke eller å bruke scripts eller tredjepartsprogrammer for å forstyrre eller jukse på :hotel.
Non-harmful auto-typing, auto-clicking a: Ikke-skadelig autoskriving, auto-clicker, og andre lignende programmer kan kun brukes hvis du er romeier eller med tillatelse fra romeieren.
You have reached the limit of maximum al: Du har nådd grensen for maksimalt tillatte kontoer
Only staff can login during maintenance!: Kun ansatte kan logge inn under vedlikehold!
The google recaptcha was submitted with: The google recaptcha was submitted with an invalid type

Please logout to claim your reward: Logg ut for å kreve belønningen din
Woah! You have successfully claimed your: Woah! Du har krevd belønningen din - Fortsett med det gode arbeidet!
Your IP have been restricted - If you th: IP-adressen din har blitt begrenset - Hvis du tror dette er en feil, kan du kontakte oss på vår Discord.
It seems like your current password is w: Det ser ut til at ditt nåværende passord er feil.
The :hotel staff team is one big happy f: The :hotel staff team is one big happy family, each staff member has a different role and duties to fulfill.
Most of our team usually consists of pla: Most of our team usually consists of players that have been around :hotel for quite a while, but this does not mean we only recruit old & known players, we recruit those who shine out to us!
How to join the staff team: How to join the staff team
Every now and then staff applications ma: Every now and then staff applications may open up. Once they do we always make sure to post a news article explaining the process - So make sure you keep an eye out for those in you are interested in joining the :hotel staff team.
You can occasionally also look at the :s: You can occasionally also look at the :startTag Staff application page :endTag which will show you all of our current open positions.
You entered something that is not allowe: You entered something that is not allowed on :hotel
Post a comment on the article, to let us: Post a comment on the article, to let us know what you think about it

You can only comment :amount times per a: You can only comment :amount times per article
You can only delete your own comments: You can only delete your own comments
You must confirm your password to contin: You must confirm your password to continue
You must confirm your current password b: You must confirm your current password before being able to toggle 2FA.
Forgot your password? No problem. Just l: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
Login to :hotel and take part in the mos: Login to :hotel and take part in the most wonderful online world!
Enter the beta code you have been provid: Enter the beta code you have been provided with
Enter your 2-factor authentication code: Enter your 2-factor authentication code provided on your by the authentication app on your mobile phone.
Enter the code from your authentication: Enter the code from your authentication app
In case you dont have access to your two: In case you dont have access to your two-factor authentication code, you can use one of your recovery codes.
Thanks for signing up! Before getting st: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you dit not receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
A new verification link has been sent to: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
There is currently no positions open: There is currently no positions open
Please come back at a later time to chec: Please come back at a later time to check if we have any positions open by then! Thank you for your interest.
Here at :hotel we open up for staff appl: Here at :hotel we open up for staff applications every now and then. Sometimes you will find this page empty other times it might be filled with positions, if you ever come across a position you feel you would fit perfectly into, then do not hesitate to apply for it.
Please field out all the fields to apply: Please field out all the fields to apply for :position. Remember when applying for a position here at :hotel you must be fully transparent and honest. If found out the information provided is false or incorrect you might risk losing your position if hired.
Thank you for playing :hotel. We have pu: Thank you for playing :hotel. We have put a lot of effort into making the hotel what it is, and we truly appreciate you being here.
:hotel is driven by Atom CMS made by:: :hotel is driven by Atom CMS made by:
An online virtual world where you can cr: An online virtual world where you can create your own avatar, make friends, chat, create rooms and much more!
Hello there! We are truly grateful that: Hello there! We are truly grateful that you have chosen Atom CMS for your hotel.
Atom CMS is built with the community in: Atom CMS is built with the community in mind, meaning we highly value community input, rather than only bringing our own ideas & vision to the CMS we try our very best to implement suggestions made by our beloved community. We want everyone to be able to contribute or customise Atom CMS to their needs without having a bachelor in programming.
Atom CMS sole purpose is to empower hote: Atom CMS sole purpose is to empower hotel owners like you. We want you to be able to run your hotel with ease. Our user-friendly interface, robust features, and helpful community are here to ensure that your experience with Atom CMS is nothing short of exceptional!
As you dive into Atom CMS, we encourage: As you dive into Atom CMS, we encourage you to explore the extensive range of features we have curated to help you bring your vision to life. From customizable templates to seamless integrations with clients like Nitro, we will have you set up in no time.
Once again, thank you for choosing Atom: Once again, thank you for choosing Atom CMS, and we cannot wait to see the incredible project you will create.
With everything being said we just want: With everything being said we just want to wish you a warm welcome to the Atom CMS family!
We are delighted of having you trying At: We are delighted of having you trying Atom CMS
Congratulations on successfully completi: Congratulations on successfully completing the Atom CMS setup! You have now taken the first steps towards an exciting new journey. With Atom CMS, you can effortlessly manage various aspect of your hotel, while giving your new visitors an easy gateway into a world of joy.
Lastly, we just want to show our gratitu: Lastly, we just want to show our gratitude by letting your know how delighted we are to be a part of your journey and we hope you will gain some amazing memories. So, here is to your new hotel, the boundless creativity it will inspire, and the endless possibilities that lie ahead.
Once again, congratulations and best of: Once again, congratulations and best of wishes for you & your hotel!
Please make sure to read our shop: Please make sure to read our shop
Once a donation has been made and receiv: Once a donation has been made and received by us, it is non-refundable under any circumstances. The donated amount which is converted into website balance cannot be converted back into cash or other forms of money. By making a donation, you acknowledge and accept these terms and agree not to initiate a chargeback or dispute with your bank or card issuer.
It is important to consider the conseque: It is important to consider the consequences of our spending habits, especially when it comes to financial decisions. If you find yourself tempted to spend money you do not have, take a moment to reflect.
Remember, your financial well-being is c: Remember, your financial well-being is crucial, and making responsible choices is key. If you are facing difficulties in controlling your spending habits, do not hesitate to seek friendly and professional guidance. There are resources available that can provide valuable advice and support.

Add an extra layer of security to your a: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling two-factor authentication
Validate your two-factor enabling by sca: Validate your two-factor enabling by scanning the following QR-code and enter your auto-generated 2-factor code from your phone.
Please save your recovery codes somewher: Please save your recovery codes somewhere safe! If you lose access to your 2FA codes, those recovery codes will be needed to regain access your account.
Please scan the QR-code above with your: Please scan the QR-code above with your phone to retrieve your two-factor authentication code.
Here at :hotel we take security very ser: Here at :hotel we take security very serious and therefore we offer you as a user a way to secure your beloved account even further, by allowing you to enable Googles 2-factor authentication!
2-factor authentication adds an extra la: 2-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account, making it physical impossible to access it without having access to your mobile phone as only your phone will contain the 2-factor authentication code which will be re-generated every 30 seconds automatically.
